entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
